member.name: T:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.CrossSectionStandard
member.summary: Represents the specification information for cross sections conforming to a specification or convention; e.g., AISC-LRFD-3.1 standard for member cross sections.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.CrossSectionStandard.#ctor(Ingr.SP3D.Common.Middle.PrivateBusinessObject)
member.summary: This constructor is used when an existing COM object is obtained from the database.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.CrossSectionStandard.GetCrossSections(System.String)
member.summary: Gets all the cross sections for a particular section type.
member.param: Section type; e.g., W, HW, CS.
member.returns: Read-only collection of cross sections for a particular section type.
member.exception: Raised when the passed argument is null.
Raised when the cross section is not found.

example.code:
Dim oCatalogStructHelper As New CatalogStructHelper() Dim sCrossSectionStandard As String = "AISC-LRFD-3.1" Dim oCrossSectionStandard As CrossSectionStandard = oCatalogStructHelper.GetCrossSectionStandard(sCrossSectionStandard)
'Get all the cross sections under this cross-section standard based on the section type. Dim sSectionType As String = "M" Dim oCrossSectionColl As ReadOnlyCollection(Of CrossSection) = oCrossSectionStandard.GetCrossSections(sSectionType)

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.CrossSectionStandard.GetCrossSectionClass(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the cross-section class from the standard.
member.exception: Raised when the cross-section class with the given name is not found in the catalog.
member.example:
This is an example of GetCrossSectionClass method to get a cross-section class with the given name.
Dim catalogStructHelper As New CatalogStructHelper() Dim crossSectionStandard As CrossSectionStandard = catalogStructHelper.GetCrossSectionStandard("AISC-LRFD-3.1") Dim crossSectionClass as CrossSectionClass = crossSectionStandard.GetCrossSectionClass("L")

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogBaseHelper.GetPart(System.String)

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogBaseHelper.GetPart(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the part given a part class name/part number or type/composition pair. This method can be used to get a part in cases where the unique part number can only be obtained by a pair; e.g, SketchCrossSection, which is obtained from the part class and a part name pair or a wall/slab part, which is obtained from a pair of type and composition.
member.param: Part class name or type string.
member.exception: Raised when part is not found.
Raised when part number is null.

member.exception: Raised when the input argument type is null.

This is an example to create CatalogStructHelper by providing the catalog connection explicitly.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogStructHelper.GetCrossSection(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a cross-section definition object given reference standard, section type, and section name.
member.param: Reference standard name; e.g., AISC-LRFD-3.1, Wall Cross Sections, Misc.
Section type; e.g., W, HW, CS.
Section name; e.g., W18x35, HW118"x60", CS1.
member.exception: Raised when the passed argument is null.
When a cross section is not found.
member.example:
This is an example of GetCrossSection method providing reference standard, section type, and section name.
Dim oCatalogStructHelper As New CatalogStructHelper() Dim sReferenceStandardName As String = "AISC-LRFD-3.1" Dim sSectionType As String = "W" Dim sSectionName As String = "W18x35" Dim oCrossSection As CrossSection = oCatalogStructHelper.GetCrossSection(sReferenceStandardName, sSectionType, sSectionName)

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogStructHelper.GetCrossSection(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a cross-section definition object given a reference standard and section name.
member.param: Reference standard name; e.g., AISC-LRFD-3.1, Wall Cross-Sections, misc.
Section name; e.g., W18x35, HW118"x60", CS1.
member.exception: Raised when the passed argument is null.
When a cross section is not found.
member.example:
This is an example of GetCrossSection method providing a reference standard and section name.
Dim oCatalogStructHelper As New CatalogStructHelper() Dim sReferenceStandardName As String = "AISC-LRFD-3.1" Dim sSectionName As String = "W18x35" Dim oCrossSection As CrossSection = oCatalogStructHelper.GetCrossSection(sReferenceStandardName, sSectionName)

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogStructHelper.GetMaterials(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a read-only collection of material objects by providing the material type.
member.param: Material type; e.g., Steel - Carbon, Concrete, Steel - High Strength Low Alloy.
member.returns: Read-only collection of material objects; an empty collection will be returned when no material is found.
member.exception: Raised when the passed argument is null.
When the material is not found.
member.example:
This is an example of GetMaterials method providing the material type.
Dim oCatalogStructHelper As New CatalogStructHelper() Dim sMaterialType As String = "Steel - Carbon" Dim oMaterialColl As ReadOnlyCollection(Of Material) = oCatalogStructHelper.GetMaterials(sMaterialType)

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogStructHelper.GetMaterial(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a material object providing the material type and grade.
member.param: Material type; e.g., Steel - Carbon, Concrete, Steel - High Strength Low Alloy.
member.exception: Raised when the passed argument is null.
Raised when the material is not found.
member.example:
This is an example of GetMaterial method providing the material type and grade.
Dim oCatalogStructHelper As New CatalogStructHelper() Dim sMaterialType As String = "Steel - Carbon" Dim sMaterialGrade As String = "A" Dim oMaterial As Material = oCatalogStructHelper.GetMaterial(sMaterialType, sMaterialGrade)

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogStructHelper.GetPlateStocks(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a read-only collection of plate stock objects for a given material type and material grade.
member.param: Material type; e.g., Steel - Carbon, Concrete, Steel - High Strength Low Alloy.
member.returns: Read-only collection of plate stock objects.
member.exception: Raised when the passed argument is null.
When plate stocks are not found.
member.example:
This is an example of GetPlateStocks method providing the material type and material grade.
Dim oCatalogStructHelper As New CatalogStructHelper() Dim sMaterialType As String = "Steel - Carbon" Dim sMaterialGrade As String = "A" Dim oPlateStockColl As ReadOnlyCollection(Of PlateStock) = oCatalogStructHelper.GetPlateStocks(sMaterialType, sMaterialGrade)

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogStructHelper.GetCrossSectionStandard(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the cross-section standard object under the Structure -> Shapes root by providing the cross-section standard name.
member.param: Cross-section standard name; e.g., AISC-LRFD-3.1, Wall Cross Sections, Misc.
member.exception: Raised when the passed argument is null.
This exception is raised if an error is encountered while getting the root object.
When the cross-section standard is not found.
member.example:
This is an example of GetCrossSectionStandard method providing the cross-section standard name.
Dim oCatalogStructHelper As New CatalogStructHelper() Dim oCrossSectionStandard As CrossSectionStandard = oCatalogStructHelper.GetCrossSectionStandard("AISC-LRFD-3.1")

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogStructHelper.GetCrossSectionClass(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the cross-section class from a given standard name.
member.exception: Raised when cross-section class with the given name is not found in the catalog.
member.example:
This is an example of GetCrossSectionClass method to get a cross-section class with the given cross-section standard name and cross-section name.
Dim catalogStructHelper As New CatalogStructHelper() Dim crossSectionClass As CrossSectionClass = catalogStructHelper.GetCrossSectionClass("AISC-LRFD-3.1","L")
